name: Hammer an Altar until you die

Consume a flask
Completely destroy a bee hive (including walls) without dying in the process
Catch a fairy and use it underground
!! Never take damage from a trap !!
Obtain 2 unique Summon Staves
Sell a Flaming Mace
Craft the Night's Edge
Have "BINGO" appear in chat using an announcement box
Obtain a weapon from a killed Town NPC
Go to the entrance of the Lihzahrd Temple
Craft a Gravedigger's shovel and destroy 500 blocks with it
Have 5 debuffs at the same time
Have each slot in your inventory be taken up by a different building block
Make Lemonade or Apple Juice
Trash Shark Bait item
Defeat King Slime using only a Flare Gun
Kill the Clothier
Place 5 different types of toilets
Obtain a Mana Flower
Complete 3 Fishing Quests
Create the following biome: Evil Desert
Fill the inventory of a Piggy Bank
